alert.note: Alert for Barry; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:01AM CDT until April 05 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BARRY AND SOUTHERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 500 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sarcoxie, or 9 miles northwest of Monett, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Monett, Aurora, Marionville, Pierce City, Purdy, Wheaton, Verona, Pioneer, Freistatt, Hoberg and Pleasant Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
